job_title: Senior Executive Finance in Patna, Bihar
pros: Paras has very clearly laid out guidelines that are easy to follow and effective for the overall organisational health. It is also a very employee friendly workplace. Paras does try to address the issues and tries to improve on them. Overall Paras is a very healthy workplace to be in
cons: sometimes Paras feels understaffed and the work load is hectic. The flexibility at Paras is slightly less as to a greater influx of patients at the hospital

pros: Good exposure as patient flow is high .
cons:
1. Hr doesnt help employees and donot understand their concern . They will hire new staff but will not even consider the old staff even if they have the qualifications.
2. They will put zero efforts to retain the staff even if the person is knowledgeable.
3. Freshers are paid much more than old experienced staff. 
4. Hr department should really focus on employee satisfaction.
